channel.title: Felids on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Felids on ZooBerry

item.title: Asian Pack Part 1
item.description: Includes the Clouded Leopard, Malayan Tapir, and Malayan Sun Bear as part of the Asia Pack.

item.title: Domestic Cat
item.description: Domestic cats with five color variations.

item.title: Party Tiger
item.description: A festive tiger with three color variations to celebrate ATW4.

item.title: Siberian Tiger
item.description: A magnificent big cat from Siberia.

item.title: Tigers
item.description: Bengal tiger pack with four natural coat variations.

item.title: Blue and Gold Tiger
item.description: A striking blue and gold tiger.

item.title: Christmas Tiger
item.description: A seasonal tiger for winter exhibits.

item.title: Liger
item.description: A hybrid big cat for your exhibits.

item.title: Maltese Tiger
item.description: A fictional tiger with two unique variants.

item.title: North American Cougar
item.description: A handsome North American cougar to enhance your zoo.

item.title: Borneo Clouded Leopard
item.description: Two variations of the Borneo Clouded Leopard, with the lighter one being the default.

item.title: African Leopard II
item.description: Big spotted African cat with savannah biome.

item.title: African Leopard II (ES Version)
item.description: Includes 100% Endangered Species design with new features for the African Leopard.

item.title: Amur Leopard II
item.description: Critically endangered Amur leopard with long legs and hair for snowy climates.

item.title: Amur Leopard II (ES Version)
item.description: Includes 100% Endangered Species design with new features for the Amur Leopard.

item.title: Asian Lion
item.description: A lion subspecies living in Gir Forest, India.

item.title: Asian Lion (ES Version)
item.description: Includes 100% Endangered Species design with new features for the Asian Lion.

item.title: Asiatic Cheetah
item.description: An endangered cheetah from Asia with no description provided.

item.title: Bobcat
item.description: A boreal cat native to North America.

item.title: Caracal
item.description: A very cute little Caracal created entirely by Exitree.

item.title: King Cheetah
item.description: A unique cheetah variant with elongated and merged spots.

item.title: White Tiger
item.description: The white version of the Bengal Tiger, released before the official XP version.

item.title: Fishing Cat
item.description: Fishing cats are solitary and found in a variety of watery habitats. Includes skins, icons, and sound files.

item.title: Clouded Leopard
item.description: A tropical rainforest cat from Southeast Asia. This amazing tropical rainforest cat is coded by Penguinman and recolored by Exitree. Enjoy!

item.title: Eastern Cougar
item.description: Here is the Eastern Cougar. This cat is colored by August and coded by Penguinman! Enjoy!

item.title: Black Lion
item.description: A black coloration of the lion. This animal is recolored by Howling Shadow Wolf with coding by both Howling Shadow Wolf and Penguinman. I hope you enjoy it!

item.title: Puma/Cougar
item.description: A large American cat that goes by many other names.

item.title: Iriomote Cat
item.description: The Iriomote cat, an endangered species from Japan.
